org.arl.goeuro.src

Class MyClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.arl.goeuro.src.MyClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IGoEuroApi, IJSONConvert

    public class MyClient
extends java.lang.Object
implements IGoEuroApi, IJSONConvert
    This class implements the IGoEuroApi and IJSONConvert interfaces. Using this class we will perform API requests also using this class we will create the csv file starting from the results of the requests API.
    Author:
    Andrea Rocco Lotronto

      javax.json.JsonArray getCitiesJSONArray(java.lang.String cityName)
      Gets a JsonArray that contains the result of the request "http://api.goeuro.com/api/v2/position/suggest/en/cityName" where cityName is given as parameter of the method.
      void makeCSVFile(javax.json.JsonArray jsonArray, java.lang.String fileName)
      Creates a csv file starting from a JsonArray, the name of the file is given as a parameter.
      void setBaseURI(java.lang.String baseURI)
      Sets the base URI of the API

        Creates a csv file starting from a JsonArray, the name of the file is given as a parameter.
